meals.meal: Marinated Pork Tenderloin with Roasted Sweet Potato
Lemon Herb Chicken with Roasted Asparagus
Crockpot Italian Sausage & Peppers over Rice
GF Fettuccine Alfredo with Garlic Butter Broccoli

recipes.name: Steak Fajita Rice Bowls
ingredients: ¾ lb flank or skirt steak, sliced thin
1 bell pepper, sliced; ½ onion, sliced
1 Tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp chili powder, ½ tsp garlic powder, salt & pepper
1 cup rice
Toppings: shredded cheese, sour cream, salsa, avocado, lime
recipes.instructions: Sear steak strips 2–3 min over high heat, remove. Sauté peppers and onions 5 min. Serve over rice with toppings.

recipes.name: Chicken Burrito Bowls
ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast, diced
1 Tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp chili powder, ½ tsp garlic powder, salt & pepper
1 cup rice
1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained
½ cup corn (frozen or canned)
½ cup salsa, ¼ cup sour cream
Toppings: shredded cheese, avocado, cilantro
recipes.instructions: Season and sauté chicken 6–7 min. Serve over rice with beans, corn, and toppings.

recipes.name: Marinated Pork Tenderloin with Roasted Sweet Potato
ingredients: 1 lb pork tenderloin
Marinade: 3 Tbsp olive oil, 1 Tbsp brown sugar, 1 tsp Dijon, 1 Tbsp tamari, ½ tsp lemon zest, 1 tsp each parsley & thyme, ½ tsp garlic, salt & pepper
2 medium sweet potatoes, cubed, tossed with olive oil, salt, pepper
recipes.instructions: Marinate 1–8 hrs. Grill or sauté to 145°F (~15 min). Rest 5 min. Roast sweet potatoes at 400°F for 25 min.

recipes.name: Lemon Herb Chicken with Roasted Asparagus
ingredients: 3 boneless skinless chicken thighs (~1 lb)
2 Tbsp olive oil, juice of 1 lemon, 1 tsp dried oregano, 1 tsp garlic powder, salt & pepper
1 bunch asparagus, trimmed, tossed with olive oil, salt, pepper
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken 30 min. Sear in skillet 5–6 min per side. Roast asparagus at 400°F for 12 min.

recipes.name: Teriyaki Chicken Rice Bowls
ingredients: 1 lb chicken thighs, sliced
Sauce: 3 Tbsp GF soy sauce/tamari, 1 Tbsp honey, 1 tsp sesame oil, 1 tsp rice vinegar, 1 tsp cornstarch + 1 Tbsp water
1 cup rice
1 cup steamed broccoli or snap peas
recipes.instructions: Sauté chicken 6 min, add sauce, cook until thickened. Serve over rice with veggies. Top with sesame seeds and green onion.

recipes.name: Crockpot Italian Sausage & Peppers over Rice
ingredients: 1 lb Italian sausage links (GF — check label)
2 bell peppers, sliced; ½ onion, sliced
1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, ½ tsp garlic powder, salt & pepper
1 cup rice
recipes.instructions: Place sausage, peppers, onions, tomatoes, and seasoning in slow cooker. Cook LOW 6 hrs. Slice sausage. Serve over rice.

recipes.name: GF Fettuccine Alfredo with Garlic Butter Broccoli
ingredients: 9 oz GF fettuccine
2 Tbsp butter, 1 cup heavy cream, 1 clove garlic minced
¾ cup grated Parmesan, salt & pepper
2 cups broccoli florets
recipes.instructions: Melt butter, sauté garlic 30 sec, add cream, simmer 3 min. Stir in Parmesan until smooth. Toss with cooked GF pasta. Steam or roast broccoli on the side.

Proteins.item: ¾ lb flank or skirt steak

Pantry / Dry Goods.item: Cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, oregano, parsley, thyme, salt, pepper
